contentrichtext.text: The '''telecommunications in Jersey''' relate to [[communication]] systems in [[Bailiwick of Jersey]], which is a British [[Crown Dependency]] off the coast of [[Normandy]], [[France]]. ==Telephony== ===Addressing=== [[Jersey]] is incorporated into the [[UK National Telephone Numbering Plan]], using the following area codes: * [[Jersey Telecom|JT Global]] (formerly [[Jersey Telecom]]{{citation needed|date=May 2013}}): ** <code>+44 1534</code>{{citation needed|date=May 2013}} for [[land-line]]s ** <code>+44 7797</code>{{citation needed|date=May 2013}} for [[Mobile phone|mobile]]s * [[Sure (Cable & Wireless)|Sure C&W]] ([[Cable & Wireless Communications]]): ** <code>+44 7700</code>{{citation needed|date=May 2013}} for mobiles * [[Airtel-Vodafone]]: ** <code>+44 7829</code>{{citation needed|date=May 2013}} for mobiles [[Guernsey]] is incorporated into the UK National Telephone Numbering Plan, using the following area codes: * JT Global (formerly [[Wave]]{{citation needed|date=May 2013}}): ** <code>+44 1481</code>{{citation needed|date=May 2013}} for land-lines ** <code>+44 7791</code>{{citation needed|date=May 2013}} for mobiles * Sure C&W (Cable & Wireless Communications): ** <code>+44 7781</code>{{citation needed|date=May 2013}} for Mobiles * Airtel-Vodafone: ** <code>+44 7839</code>{{citation needed|date=May 2013}} for mobiles. ===Telephone adoption and usage=== ====Fixed line==== Fixed [[Public Switched Telephone Network|PSTN]] lines in use; approx 57,700 ([[2009]]).{{citation needed|date=May 2013}} ====Mobile cellular==== * [[Jersey Telecom|JT Group Limited]] * [[Sure (Cable & Wireless)]] * [[Airtel-Vodafone]] Approx 108,000 active [[Subscriber Identity Module|SIM]]s.{{citation needed|date=May 2013}} With over 120 [[mobile phone mast]]s, in [[2012]],<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.gov.je/PlanningBuilding/MobilePhoneMasts/ |title=Mobile phone base stations and masts |publisher=States of Jersey |date=2012-07-26
